Column Layouts

These layouts use the columns() layout mode to create various patterns.
When you add more items, repeatable patterns continue automatically, indicated with gray elements.

1 Item

Columns 1

1-column layout (default) <lay-out md="columns(1)">

2 Items

Columns 2

2-column layout with equal width columns <lay-out md="columns(2)" lg="columns(2)">

3 Items

Columns 3

3-column layout with equal width columns <lay-out md="grid(3a)" lg="columns(3)">
